message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident we can come to an agreement. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm interested in making a deal, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,100,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000. This is a fair price, considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,250,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but I can't go any lower than $1,200,000.  This is the minimum I'm willing to accept. It's still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're willing to close the deal at this price.
